channel.title: Credit-Cards on FinanceCraftedSheets
channel.description: Recent content in Credit-Cards on FinanceCraftedSheets

item.title: Negotiate Your APR: Scripts and Steps That Actually Work
item.description: When to call your credit card company. Exact scripts for APR negotiation. Hardship programs explained. What to do if they say no. Real example: negotiated from 18.5% to 14.2% in one call.

item.title: The Real Cost of Minimum Payments: How Credit Card Interest Compounds Against You
item.description: See exactly how sticking to the minimum payment keeps you in debt for decades. Real math, real strategies, and one clear path out.

item.title: The Real Cost of Minimum Payments: How Credit Card Interest Compounds Against You
item.description: See exactly how sticking to the minimum payment keeps you in debt for decades. Real math, real strategies, and one clear path out.
